summary: Documentary about the late Chicago artist and musician Wesley Willis. Filmmaker Daniel Bitton follows Willis throughout the Chicago area, riding the bus, talking to friends and strangers ... See full summary »
cast: Wesley Willis|Vaginal Croutons|The Causey Way|Steve Albini|Mike Davis|Bob Fredericks|Dale Meiners|Tammy Smith|Carla Winterbottom
title: Wesley Willis
